page.title: 09VILLAGE CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: There is a Dramatic Society at Frant.They usully have a "Music Hall" every year and a play at Christmas. There is a Frantique at Frant by the Church held on Wednesdays.There is a bowling club and a cricket club in the middle of the village. Some of the ladies in the village are members of the WI and they go to the Village Hall every month.They have Brownies on Tuesdays every week for one and a half hours. Every year they have a flower show when children and grown ups have competitions for the best plants, produce and food.Children can do craft and cooking and enter them for the show.
